topics.title: Aerobatics Input Control
topics.description: The instructor emphasizes the importance of controlling inputs while performing aerobatics to avoid aggressive snaps and maintain stability.
evidence_quotes: Just adding slight inputs at a time, catching it with throttle.
Reducing throttle is probably the biggest importance...

topics.title: Basic Aerobatics Techniques
topics.description: The instructor demonstrates basic aerobatics techniques such as right and left rolls, flips, and stalls.
evidence_quotes: I'm going to go out and fly out and just have a good time...

topics.title: Basic Loop Demonstration
topics.description: The instructor demonstrates how to perform a basic loop, including adding throttle and pulling back.
evidence_quotes: That's how you do a basic loop.
Adding throttle, pulling elevator all the way through, and then stopping.
